title: Text message flawed
body:
To Bohannas: Hi what up
> [11:56:02 PM] You were denied Text message privileges in The Tiki Bar (this is not a PG channel).

im sending a message to a user not the channel they just happen to be in that channel can you fix this  


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1042/ .
